text: Niscaya ami bahuto jbina arau manaraka jahannamara babe srsti karaicho, sihamtara hrdaya ache kintu tara dbaraa sihamte upalabdhi nakarae, sihamtara caku ache kintu tara dbaraa sihamte nedekhe arau sihamtara kana ache kintu tara dbaraa sihamte nusune, sihamta catuspada jantura darae, baram tatokai adhika bibhraanta. Sihamte'i haiche udasina
